## StoresClient.modifyFiles() method

Modify files in a policy store.

**Signature:**

```typescript
modifyFiles(request: ModifyFilesRequest, options?: RequestOptions): Promise<ModifyFilesResponse>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

request


</td><td>

[ModifyFilesRequest](./hub.modifyfilesrequest.md)


</td><td>


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

[RequestOptions](./core.requestoptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>


**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[ModifyFilesResponse](./hub.modifyfilesresponse.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Remarks

This is a "patch" operation; files that aren't included in the request won't be modified.

## Example


```typescript
const { newStoreVersion } = await stores.modifyFiles({
  storeId: "MWPKEMFX3CK1",
  operations: [
    {
      addOrUpdate: {
        path: "policy.yaml",
        contents: await readFile("path/to/policy.yaml"),
      },
    },
  ],
});
```
